*1059_Item_BookOfEulogies*.name: Book of Eulogies
*1059_Item_BookOfEulogies*.description: Passive: Restores 25 health whenever you kill a minion or monster (65 if using a melee default attack). Vampirism: 4% lifesteal (does not stack with other Vampirism) +5 Weapon Power

*1080_Item_MinionsFoot*.name: Minion's Foot
*1080_Item_MinionsFoot*.description: Passive: After buying this item, your very first attack on enemy hero will crit. +10% Critical Chance +5% Critical Damage

*1060_Item_BarbedNeedle*.name: Barbed Needle
*1060_Item_BarbedNeedle*.description: Vampirism: 8% lifesteal (does not stack with other Vampirism) +12 Weapon Power

*1066_Item_PiercingSpear*.name: Piercing Spear
*1066_Item_PiercingSpear*.description: Armorbreaker: +10% armor pierce (does not stack with other Armorbreaker) +15 Weapon Power

*1034_Item_SerpentMask*.name: Serpent Mask
*1034_Item_SerpentMask*.description: Passive: Your next 600-1200 (level 1-12) points of weapon damage to enemy heroes has +25% lifesteal, recharges over 40s. Vampirism: +10% lifesteal (does not stack with other Vampirism) Passive: Book of Eulogies +100 Weapon Power

spellsword.name: Spellsword
spellsword.description: Passive: Every basic attack grants you 4 energy (12 on heroes). +100 Weapon Power +35% Cooldown Speed +3 Energy Recharge

*1092_Item_PoisonedShiv*.name: Poisoned Shiv
*1092_Item_PoisonedShiv*.description: Passive: Every 2 basic attacks will apply a mortal wound for 2s. Vampirism: +8% lifesteal (does not stack with other Vampirisim) Passive: Book of Eulogies +40 Weapon Power +30% Attack Speed

*1067_Item_BreakingPoint*.name: Breaking Point
*1067_Item_BreakingPoint*.description: Passive: Gain 10 weapon power for every 160 weapon damage done to enemy heroes +5/10 (Melee/Ranged) damage needed for each stack thereafter. 25 stacks max. Decays 3 stacks per second after you've stopped stacking for 2.5s. +20% Attack Speed +55 Weapon Power

*1035_Item_TensionBow*.name: Tension Bow
*1035_Item_TensionBow*.description: Passive: Every 6s, your next basic attack will deal 240 bonus damage. Armorbreaker: +10% armor pierce (does not stack with other Armorbreaker) +60 Weapon Power

*1039_Item_Bonesaw*.name: Bonesaw
*1039_Item_Bonesaw*.description: Passive: Your basic attacks shred 5% of the target's armor for 3s. Max 8 stacks. Armorbreaker: +18% armor pierce (does not stack with other Armorbreakers) +15 Weapon Power +25% Attack Speed

*1014_Item_TornadoTrigger*.name: Tornado Trigger
*1014_Item_TornadoTrigger*.description: Passive: Your basic attacks shred 5% of the target's armor for 3s. Max 8 stacks. Armorbreaker: +18% armor pierce (does not stack with other Armorbreakers) +15 Weapon Power +25% Attack Speed
